podcasts.name: Huberman Lab
podcasts.description: Neuroscientist Andrew Huberman discusses science-based tools for everyday life. Topics include neuroscience, fitness, nutrition, mental health, and productivity.

podcasts.name: Making Sense
podcasts.description: Sam Harris explores the most important questions about the human mind, society, and current events through conversations with thought leaders.

podcasts.name: The Knowledge Project
podcasts.description: Shane Parrish interviews world-class performers to uncover the frameworks that help them master their craft and live more meaningful lives.

podcasts.name: Invest Like the Best
podcasts.description: Patrick O'Shaughnessy explores the investing landscape through conversations with the best investors and entrepreneurs in the world.

podcasts.name: Deep Questions with Cal Newport
podcasts.description: Cal Newport answers questions about cultivating a deep life in a distracted world, covering topics like productivity, focus, and meaningful work.

podcasts.name: How I Built This
podcasts.description: Guy Raz dives into the stories behind some of the world's best known companies. How I Built This weaves a narrative journey about innovators, entrepreneurs and idealistsâ€”and the movements they built.

podcasts.name: Masters of Scale
podcasts.description: Reid Hoffman, co-founder of LinkedIn and legendary Silicon Valley investor, tests his theories of how companies scale from zero to a gazillion with legendary leaders.

podcasts.name: The Prof G Pod
podcasts.description: Scott Galloway offers unfiltered, provocative insights and predictions about business, tech, and what's in store for the future. No mercy. No malice.

podcasts.name: Acquired
podcasts.description: Every company has a story. Learn the playbooks that built the world's greatest companies â€” and how you can apply them as a founder, operator, or investor.

podcasts.name: My First Million
podcasts.description: Shaan Puri and Sam Parr brainstorm new business ideas based on trends and opportunities in the market, sharing insights from their own business ventures.
